TopicTitle: Subassemblly Seems to not not work.

Articles.Content:
I can create and name a subassembly, but if i try to use it i can not place it anywhere. If i have a subassembly selected i can also not select any other parts. So far, leaving the hanger is the only way i have been able to deselect the subassembly.

edit: Apparently, the hang up is caused by having no free green attachment points(i did not need it for that particular part). I just wanted a subassembly consisting of an air intake, a fuel tank, and a jet engine, for early game planes, and i wanted to avoid making them all piece by piece. 

Edited July 11, 2019 by Spacewalker12
